#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int perm(string c,int i,int siz)
{
	char t;
	if(i == (siz))
	{
		
		//t = c[i];
		//c[i] = c[i+1];
		//c[i+1] = t;
		cout<<c<<endl;
		return 0;
	}
	else
	{
		int j = i;
		t = c[i];
		while(j <= siz)
		{
			c[i] = c[j];
			c[j] = t;
			perm(c,i+1,siz);
			//cout<<c<<endl;
			t = c[j];
			c[j] = c[i];
			c[i] = t;
			j++;
		}
	}
	//perm(c,i+1,siz);
	
	
	
	return 0;
	
}
int main()
{
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	cout<<endl;
	int j;
	//for(j = 0; c[j] != '\0'; j++){}
	int siz = s.length();
	perm(s,0,siz-1);
	cout<<s<<" "<<endl;
	return 0;
}
